title: Olive Wood Mixing Spoons (Set of 2)
description: It is easy to appreciate these gorgeous wooden mixing spoons. The rich color and interesting veins are characteristic of the beautiful Olive Wood. Because it is hardwood, it will not scratch, stain, or absorb odors, making it very hygienic. Includes a set of 2-Mixing Spoons. Wash by hand in warm soapy water. These spoons are made from trees that were grown to harvest olives. Only when the trees could no longer produce olives, were they used for the production of these utensils.Includes a set of 2 olive wood mixing spoonsIdeal for cooking and servingBeautiful rich color and interesting vein designSafe for use with non-stick cookwareTight wood structure does not absorb odors or flavorsAmong the most hygienic woods for use with foodHand wash
